attributes.action: Add a public holiday in the summer to enable families to celebrate Christmas
attributes.additional_details:
To give everyone something to look forward to - in a similar way to how people look forward to Christmas 
As a thankyou to and a permanent acknowledgment of the NHS 
To allow the retail sector, and in particular high street as well as the hospitality sector the opportunity to recover income lost in December 2020.
attributes.background: Add a bank holiday weekend to include a Friday and a Monday to the calendar. In 2021 this would allow families to get together to celebrate Christmas 2020 that for many was cancelled. In future it could be dedicated to the NHS and the end of Coronovirus. It could be called NHS BH Weekend

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make June 25th. 2021 an "Australian Christmas" bank holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183

Christmas in July - 2 extra days off on Friday 23rd and Monday 26th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564171

Make 26th & 27th July 2021 a one off Double Bank Holiday - Christmas in July: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561169
